content: Violet Hail is one of the final Key Items you may miss in Black Myth: Wukong's fourth chapter in The Webbed Hollow. Unlike one of the Transformation Spells that bears the same name, this is a one-time use item needed to obtain that spell, hidden in the chapter's secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Hail_(Key_Item).md', within the main section titled 'Violet Hail (Key Item)'.
The content is as follows:
Violet Hail is one of the final Key Items you may miss in Black Myth: Wukong's fourth chapter in The Webbed Hollow. Unlike one of the Transformation Spells that bears the same name, this is a one-time use item needed to obtain that spell, hidden in the chapter's secret area.
